page.title: 01Review of the area.
page.content: Life in our block(Summary of the area) ( Rhian and Delyth,2pages); Shopping Survey (Out of town shopping) (Class 4K Goetre Junior school 2pages BMX Bikes(David and Chris.1 page); The Sinclair C5 car (Alex 2 pages); Things to do in our block (Andrew and Joanne 2 pages );Dowlais Police Station (Class 4 Aloysius R C School 1 page);Morlais Castle (Samantha and Gareth 1 page);Cyfarthfa Castle and Museum (Stephanie & Jayne 1 page); Museum Attendant -Interview.(Class 3 Aloysius R C School 1 page);Brecon Mountain Railway (Pant School Class 4 1 page);Dowlais Stables(Rhiannon 1page);Family work patterns(Gareth 1 page);A Day in the Life of Lisa Lisa 1 page);St.Aloysius R C Church (Terence 1 Page);List of contributors.
